TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit XmlTypeMapping extends System.Xml.Serialization.XmlMapping

summary.span: 包含从一种类型到另一种类型的映射。

span.span: Contains a mapping of one type to another.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类用于序列化对象作为编码的 SOAP XML。The class is used to serialize an object as encoded SOAP XML. 结果 XML 符合万维网联合会 (www.w3.org) 文档，"简单对象访问协议 (SOAP) 1.1"的第 5 节。The resulting XML conforms to section 5 of the World Wide Web Consortium (www.w3.org) document, "Simple Object Access Protocol (SOAP) 1.1". 创建通过调用方法类。Create an by calling the method of the class. 使用构造的实例类。Use the to construct an instance of the class. 若要控制序列化，使用中列出的属性之一[属性，控制编码 SOAP 序列化](~/docs/standard/serialization/attributes-that-control-encoded-soap-serialization.md)。To control the serialization, use one of the attributes listed in [Attributes That Control Encoded SOAP Serialization](~/docs/standard/serialization/attributes-that-control-encoded-soap-serialization.md). ## Examples 下面的示例将名为的类的实例序列化为`Transportation`，其中包含名为的字段`Vehicle`。The following example serializes an instance of a class named `Transportation` that contains a field named `Vehicle`. A应用到字段。A is applied to the field. 当字段被序列化时，XML 元素名称是"轮"而不是"Vehicle"。When the field is serialized, the XML element name is "Wheels" instead of "Vehicle". `SerializeOverride`方法创建和设置属性到。The `SerializeOverride` method creates a and sets the property of a to the . 添加到用于创建。The is added to a that is used to create an . 构造，和的一个实例`Transportation`类再次序列化。An is constructed with the , and an instance of the `Transportation` class is again serialized. 因为是用于重写的序列，生成的 XML 元素名称现在是"Truck"而不是"轮"。Because the is used to override the serialization, the generated XML element name is now "Truck" instead of "Wheels". [!code-cpp[SoapElementOverrides#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SoapElementOverrides/CPP/soapelementoverrides.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[SoapElementOverrides#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SoapElementOverrides/CS/soapelementoverrides.cs#1)] [!code-vb[SoapElementOverrides#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SoapElementOverrides/VB/soapelementoverrides.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property TypeFullName As String
public: property System::String ^ TypeFullName { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 包含命名空间和类型的完全限定类型名。

span.span: The fully qualified type name that includes the namespace (or namespaces) and type.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property TypeName As String
public: property System::String ^ TypeName { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取所映射对象的类型名。

span.span: Gets the type name of the mapped object.
The type name of the mapped object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类型名称是对象的映射的类名称。The type name is the class name of the mapped object. 此外可以通过检查查看的完全限定的名称属性。You can also see the fully qualified name by examining the property. ## Examples [!code-cpp[XmlTypeMapping Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/XmlTypeMapping Example/CPP/mapping.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[XmlTypeMapping Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/XmlTypeMapping Example/CS/mapping.cs#1)] [!code-vb[XmlTypeMapping Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/XmlTypeMapping Example/VB/mapping.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property XsdTypeName As String
public: property System::String ^ XsdTypeName { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取所映射对象的 XML 元素名称。

span.span: Gets the XML element name of the mapped object.

value.span: 所映射对象的 XML 元素名称。

span.span: The XML element name of the mapped object.

value.span: 默认值为对象的类名称。

span.span: The default is the class name of the object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要设置对象的备用元素名称，请应用于类和组属性的新值。To set an alternate element name of an object, apply a to the class, and set the property to a new value. ## Examples [!code-cpp[XmlTypeMapping Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/XmlTypeMapping Example/CPP/mapping.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[XmlTypeMapping Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/XmlTypeMapping Example/CS/mapping.cs#1)] [!code-vb[XmlTypeMapping Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/XmlTypeMapping Example/VB/mapping.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property XsdTypeNamespace As String
public: property System::String ^ XsdTypeNamespace { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取所映射对象的 XML 命名空间。

span.span: Gets the XML namespace of the mapped object.

value.span: 所映射对象的 XML 命名空间。

span.span: The XML namespace of the mapped object.
The default is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要设置对象的命名空间名称，请应用于类和组属性的新值。To set a namespace name of an object, apply a to the class, and set the property to a new value. ## Examples [!code-cpp[XmlTypeMapping Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/XmlTypeMapping Example/CPP/mapping.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[XmlTypeMapping Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/XmlTypeMapping Example/CS/mapping.cs#1)] [!code-vb[XmlTypeMapping Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/XmlTypeMapping Example/VB/mapping.vb#1)]
